attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current abortion time limit is about 24 weeks, there has recently been a case where a little girl was born at 22 weeks and has lived. She is now home safely with her mum. I am calling for the abolishment of the abortion law. As this proves children are alive even at 22 weeks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
